block.p: HICKS, MUSE, TATE & FURST INC., Dallas, and UnitedGlobalCom, Denver, are planning to combine their Latin American cable assets into a holding company, which would then raise $800 million to $1 billion in an initial public offering in New York.
MILLENNIUM CHEMICALS INC., Red Bank, N.J., said it had abandoned an attempt to sell its 29.5 percent stake in Equistar Chemical, Houston, because of low offers.

HICKS, MUSE, TATE & FURST INC., Dallas, and UnitedGlobalCom, Denver, are planning to combine their Latin American cable assets into a holding company, which would then raise $800 million to $1 billion in an initial public offering in New York.
MILLENNIUM CHEMICALS INC., Red Bank, N.J., said it had abandoned an attempt to sell its 29.5 percent stake in Equistar Chemical, Houston, because of low offers.
HOMESTORE.COM INC., Thousand Oaks, Calif., acquired the Hessel Group, Wilton, Conn. Terms were not disclosed.
KAISER ALUMINUM CORP., Houston, the No. 2 aluminum maker in the United States, said it increased prices 5 percent for aerospace aluminum.
